topic: Techniques for identifying hidden inefficiencies in AI-driven energy solutions
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprising discoveries are likely hidden within the assumptions I take for granted in my daily life. As a next step, I will intentionally examine familiar areas of my life with a critical eye, questioning what I typically overlook or assume to be true. I plan to set aside time each week to reflect on one aspect of my routine or environment, aiming to uncover unexpected insights or opportunities for growth.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
